activities.name: Horizon_NSIP_Advice
activities.description: Getting the data from the horizon table Horizon_vw_NSIPAdvice to bring into ODW

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
[AdviceNodeId]
,[CaseReference]
,[AdviceReference]
,[AdviceStatus]
,[Section51Advice]
,[EnquirerFirstname]
,[EnquirerLastname]
,[EnquirerOrganisation]
,[EnquiryDate]
,[EnqiryMethod]
,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CAST([Enquiry]AS NVarchar(MAX)),',',' '), CHAR(13), ' '), CHAR(10), ' ') AS [Enquiry]
,[AdviceFrom]
,[AdviceDate]
,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CAST([Advice]AS NVarchar(MAX)),',',' '), CHAR(13), ' '), CHAR(10), ' ') AS [Advice]
,[AdviceLastModified]
,[AttachmentCount]
,[AttachmentsLastModified]
,[LastPublishedDate]
,[CaseNodeId]
,[WelshLanguage]
,[CaseworkType]
FROM [otcs].[dbo].[Horizon_vw_NSIPAdvice]
